Posts.Content: May 4, 2018 03:53PM MiAnBu wrote: It has been 3 days since my surgery and I am able to walk around the house, brush my teeth, hair, and change my clothes. All at a snails pace but getting easier everyday. My surgery went well, Dr. feels confident that she was able to get all of the cancer but waiting on pathology to confirm.
Posts.Title: May 2018 Surgery Support Group ReadyAbout SPDGirl

Posts.Content: Apr 26, 2018 10:51PM MiAnBu wrote: I am bellying up! LOL - My double mastectomy with reconstruction (expanders) is scheduled for 05/01/2018. I was diagnosed 03/19/2018 with invasive mammary carcinoma with lobular features, intermediate combined. I feel as though I have been moving through life in a daze everyday since. While I am thankful that I finally discovered this site, it angers and saddens me that so many woman have to experience breast cancer.
